committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the State Taxation of Depositories Act.

summary.as: Senate agreed to House amendment with amendment
summary.text: (Senate reconsidered its action and agreed to House amendment with an amendment) Extends, effective January 1, 1976, the State Taxation of Depositories Act to September 12, 1976. Authorizes negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) accounts in Connecticut, Rhode Island, Maine, and Vermont. Exempts from specified civil liability provisions of the Truth in Lending Act, those acts done in good faith in conformity with any rule, regulation, or interpretation thereof by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, or in conformity with any interpretation or approval by an official or employee of the System duly authorized to so act. Prohibits a seller from imposing a surcharge on a credit card transaction. Deletes provisions from such Act limiting cash purchase discounts to five percent. Terminates the effectiveness of such deletion three years after enactment of this Act. Provides that any discount offered under specified provisions of such Act shall not be considered a finance charge or other charge for credit under the usury laws or specified disclosure laws of any State.

titles.title: A bill to extend the State Taxation of Depositories Act.
